name: Redshift - Space Battles
description:
Commander,
Take command of a Federation’s fleet defending against the evil Galactic Union. Fight and Build your fleet in this game with stunning, flashy 3D battles. Upgrade your ships as your progress through and game and fight harder enemies. Fight against other players or the A.I in gritty explosive space battles.

HOW TO PLAY
Start out with a small fleet and fight explosive flashy space battles to find more loot which can be used to expand your fleet and base over time. As you grow in strength unlock stronger ships with cool abilities. Build mighty capital ships which can take on entire fleets by themselves unlock gear for them as you play by collecting schematics.
This game containers over 100 hours of content for you to progress through.

FEATURES
• FREE to play
• Lead an epic fleet into battle
• Co-op with players from around the world in challenging Rifts.
• Upgrade ships to create the ultimate fleet
• Use strategy to complete challenging missions
• Join Alliances and work together towards glory
• Play on the Phone, Tablet or Browser.
• Compete in Ladder Events for great prizes.
• Capital Ships which are an entire fleet in one.
• Launch daring planet raids for resources.
• Fight other player’s fleets.
